name: WP-SEOstats
author: DrMosko

sections.description:
Features include in the Toolbar:

  • Google PageRank – Google PageRank for the given URL.
  • Google Total Backlinks.
  • Google Plus Shares.
  • Twitter.
  • Facebook likes.
  • Alexa Global Rank – global Alexa Traffic Rank (last 3 months).
  • Alexa Back link Count – Alexa’s backlink count for the given domain.
  • OpenSiteExplorer Domain Authority – Predicts this domain’s ranking potential in the search engines (1 to 100 count).
  • OpenSiteExplorer Page Authority – Predicts this page’s ranking potential in the search engines (1 to 100 count).
  • OpenSiteExplorer Root-Domain Inbound Links – Number of unique root domains.
  • OpenSiteExplorer Total Links – All links to this page including internal, external, followed, and nofollowed.
  • OpenSiteExplorer Just added links – Number of links to this page found over the past 32 days.

Features include in Dashboard:

  • above features for the domain and Google PageRank Graph History.

Features include in Admin Pages:

  • Alexa Graphs included Data : Alexa Site rank change, Alexa Site Title ,Alexa Site Description, Alexa Total Sites Linking In, Alexa Country set, all alexa Graphs – see screenshot.
  • SemRush Graphs for the domain.
  • majestic SEO Graphs backlink info.

Notes:

  • script need php 5.3+ vr

We thank DossiHost for their cooperation with the plugin SEO info.

wordpress plugin development

This script uses https://github.com/eyecatchup/SEOstats
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘WP-SEOstats’
  3. Activate WP-SEOstats from your Plugins page.
  4. Visit ‘Setting > WP-SEOstats’.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download WP-SEOstats.
  2. Upload the ‘WP-SEOstats’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate WP-SEOstats from your Plugins page.
  4. Visit ‘Setting > WP-SEOstats’.
sections.changelog:

  • fixed alexa country xml mathod

  • added facbook share to toolbar
  • fixed facebooke like mathod

2.1

  • alexa fetch data method changed
  • added data from alexa to alexa graphs page

2.0

  • Added SEOstats to wordpress dashboard
  • Added majestic SEO backlink info page
  • Added Google PageRank Graph History
  • Added Alexa Rank and TotalBacklinks to alexa graphs page

1.01

  • Google Plus collection changed from original SEOstats to curl with json.

1.00

  • call admin bar fix.

0.03

  • Isolate edit pages/posts fix.

0.02

  • Added Mozscape ApiKeys.
  • Added Alexa Graphs Admin page.
  • Added SemRush Graphs Admin page.

short_description: Add SEO stats to the Admin Toolbar in every page/post and also in the edit page/post.
